Header.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack web developer with a drive to learn and apply my skills. I am highly focused and adaptable, dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the unique needs of each project. I am eager to further develop my skills and grow professionally in the IT industry.

AboutMe.about: I have a deep enthusiasm for combining React's creativity for modern interfaces with the scalable power of Node.js on the backend. With experience in freelance projects and a collaborative approach, I tackle technical and design challenges with determination. I always seek innovative solutions while staying up-to-date with the latest trends, striving to create exceptional web experiences and contribute to cutting-edge projects.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: I always strive to stay up-to-date

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Unique web experiences, designed just for you

plan1.title: Simple Page
plan1.description: Boost your online presence with an attractive and effective landing page that captures your visitors' attention and guides them towards the desired action.

plan2.title: Medium Page
plan2.description: Elevate your brand with a comprehensive website. Showcase your story, services, and updates. Convert visitors into customers while optimizing the user experience.

plan3.title: Advanced Page
plan3.description: Take your website to the next level. Dynamic interaction, user authentication, and custom functionality. Turn ideas into reality with powerful web capabilities.

description.item1: My professional education is progressing at
description.item2: , where I'm pursuing a bachelor's degree in Systems Engineering. Through this educational path, I am gaining essential skills to tackle the ever-evolving challenges in the field of technology and computing.

courses.title: Courses
courses.course1: It is a national and federal program aimed at training individuals in programming languages, testing, and digital skills to enhance employability in the software and technology sector.
courses.course2: This Go course on Udemy starts from scratch and covers a wide range of topics, from language fundamentals to building web applications and implementing microservices. The course also includes creating command-line applications and managing databases.
courses.course3: I acquired practical skills in distribution installation and fundamental concepts such as regular expressions, bash scripting, and Linux environment tools for data manipulation and task automation.
courses.course4: I learned how to design user interfaces for mobile applications using UX/UI design principles, from research to functional prototyping and testing with real users.
